title: [1.4.7~1.6.4][ssp/smp]充满敌意的世界[Hostile Worlds] v0.43 Alpha
author: likai3366390
txt_content:
本帖最后由 likai3366390 于 2014-7-10 21:10 编辑 

0.4.3版本已跟进
官方下载地址
度娘盘
此版本官方解释是 修复错误,全面和他的mod兼容
他的mod的列表
此大大做了不少mod,比如僵尸意识，龙卷风，自定义天气啥的


最新进度:正在汉化Mod文件,争取快速解决
{:10_494:}在这里KEN要说明一下,这个mod与别的mod的兼容性实在是不敢恭敬,所以加多了mod可能会有报错,BUG什么的,如果出现了这种情况,请逐个排除,实在不会的小白,可以把服务端/客户端打包发上来,我帮你解决报错此Mod还处于Alpha阶段,连Beta阶段都不能算,有Bug请及时发过来,谢谢

是不是觉得原版太轻松？即使是极限生存也感觉无压力?
是不是想和妹(基)子(友)进行一次刺激的生存冒险,体验一种真正的"生存模式"?
但是又不想玩群(抖)峦(M)传说或者雷(抖)格(M)科技,因为这两个Mod实在是太虐了.
那么,难度适中,却让你肾上腺激素激增的Mod,却少之又少.
没错,Hostile Worlds为此而生了.
在这个Mod里,入侵者(团结的僵尸大军)会通过一颗坠落的陨石,进入你的世界,当陨石坠落的时候,他们会在你脚下最近的地下洞穴里安家.他们的领导者会挖爆方块来前进;他们告诉你什么叫做团结;他们告诉你什么叫做天空也不安全;他们告诉你需要建一个木屋.
Hostile Worlds到底是一个什么样子的mod呢,让我们先看几张图片.








嗯,,直接盗用了原帖的图片
看完图片有没有一种很奇葩的感觉？其实这个mod也算是一个比较神奇的mod吧

官网Mod简介
先说明咯,本人的技术能力有限,如果发现错误,欢迎帮忙指正
Overworld Invasions                入侵主世界(感谢 我的蛋蛋 帮忙指正翻译错误!) 

Portal Invasions: Meteorites crash to the ground and create a portal leading to another dimension, 
入侵的入口:陨石坠落到地面上时会创建一个通往另一个维度的门.
monsters will start invading through it in waves until you find a way to close the portal.
怪物将会从这个门开始入侵你的世界直到你想出关掉门的办法.
Cave InvBasions: Once the invaders have made their introduction via Meteorite, they will also be able to 
从地下洞穴入侵:一旦入侵者通过陨石成功入侵至你的世界，他们也许会开始.
spawn in deep caves around you.
在你周围的地下洞穴产卵.
Adaption: It's a sandbox world, so everything adapts to you and your friends active skill and ability level to always provide a challenging experience.
忠告:这是一个沙盒世界,所以所有的事情都始终提供一个具有挑战性的经验，这适合你和你的朋友去提高技能和能力水平.
- Base difficulties: easy, normal, hard                基础难度:简单,正常,困难
- Adds more challenge based off of all players equipment, both averaging and adding difficulty based off of it             基于所有玩家设备增加了更多的挑战,基于平均和增加困难(这一段楼主有点没太看明白)
- Difficulty rises as more invasions come from the same source      将会越来越难,随着越来越多的入侵来自同一来源
- Difficulty effects invaders health,damage, and amount spawned            难度会影响入侵者的健康,生命值和数量

Invaders       入侵者

Zombie Miner: The leader, he can dig himself out of almost any situation and guide his army along the
僵尸矿工:一位领导者,他能在几乎任何情况下通过挖掘前进,引导他的军队
right path towards your base.
沿着正确的道路走向你的基地。
- Main Ability: Digs through obstacles        主要能力:通过挖掘来穿过障碍
- Digs stairway paths upwards or downwards for other entities to use    向上/下挖掘楼梯以供其他入侵者使用
- Keeps the area around him actively loaded to ensure hes always on the job (chunkloader tech)
他的职责是保持他周围的入侵者积极进行
- Other invaders follow him while working their way towards their target
其他入侵者跟随他工作时，共同面对他们的目标
Zombie Invader: The army, fast and deadly, these guys will clump up and throw themselves at you 
僵尸入侵者:(入侵者的)军队、快速和致命的,这些家伙会竖成一列扔向你
incase you think heights can keep you safe.
如果你认为高度可以保证你的安全。
- Main Ability: Groups and stacks up over walls, can reach any height based on number of invaders
主要能力:团结,叠成墙,并可以达到基于数量的侵略者的任何高度
- Stacks up in open air, attempting to wrap around overhangs
他们可以堆在户外,并企图包围着.

Zombie Climber: M.I.A., last seen placing ladders helping other vanilla zombies get to hard to reach places.        僵尸爬行者:失踪中,最后一次被目击正在放置梯子去帮助其他普通的僵尸去难以达到的地方
- Currently not used, WIP      目前还未被使用 还在制作中（看来下一个版本会加入也说不定)
- Main Ability: Can climb anything, places ladders while doing it for everything else to follow
主要能力:可以在任何地方爬,放置梯子去做任何事情

Invaders Dimension       侵略者的维度

To eventually be a full fledged dimension with some terrifying generation. I'd like to work out an actual
最终是一个完全成熟的尺寸与一些可怕的一代。我想解决一个真实
story behind all this, thinking their world (or worlds) are doomed to be destroyed by the giant world
的故事，这一切的背后，思考他们的世界（或是很多世界）是注定要被人破坏的巨大的世界
 eaters. They worked out a way to send meteors out to place portals on other worlds, which they hope
他们制定出一种方式从世界各地发送消息，当他们打算某一天召集 回家
 to call home one day.
- Has a multi staged boss battle, a bit of a suprise half way      有了多人战斗的Boss,多少有点惊喜
- Gain the ability to weild particles through defeating the boss
当击败Boss时获得击败Boss的增益

下载地址
世界处处充满敌意 Hostile Worlds v0.41 Alpha下载
尊重原作者,强烈建议从官方adf.ly下载,让作者得到应有的收入。备份节点{:10_492:}度娘网盘
↓如何安装↓
1.把下载后得到的zip文件打开,得到3个文件夹,将这3个文件夹解压到.minecraft文件夹
2首次触发入侵事件是在3天之后,请耐心等待,如果来不及的话,就输入/hw invasion star
作者建议的Mod配置
在游戏里输入 "/config" 就会出现一个界面,嗯这就是Hostile Worlds的设置界面.
{
I:areaConverterReplaceBlocksWith=48I:coolDownBetweenInvasionsCave=12000
I:coolDownBetweenInvasionsPortal=120000
I:coolDownBetweenWaves=12000
I:coolDownFirstTime=72000
I:difficulty=1
B:invadersDropNothing=true
I:invasionBaseInvaderCount=6
I:invasionCaveChancePercent=70
B:invasionCaves=true
B:invasionManyPerPortal=false
B:invasionPortal=true
I:invasionPortalChancePercent=30
I:invasionWaveCountMax=6
I:meteorCrashDistFromPlayerMax=400
I:meteorCrashDistFromPlayerMin=50
S:noInvadeWhitelist=
B:portalTeleporting=true
}

对Hostile Worlds稍微做一下简洁的教程吧
1,进入游戏后输入/hw invasion star;当然你也可以先晚上3个MC天.但这里要注意,输入完毕之后，即使没有提示是正常的,也许作者粗心没加,期待作者下次更新时加上

2,楼主没能等到他们发现我,于是就下了一番功夫去找他们的足迹,功夫不负有心人啊,终于让我找到了


嗯....还是挺有组织意识的
3,这里楼主手动切换了一下生存模式,等一会儿之后,终于发现了LZ.


要不要这么萌www



4，本来打算找到入侵门来做演示的,结果愣是没找到,只能通过创造模式刷物品做演示了
首先，你可以在洞穴中找到这个方块
 (这是官网的图)
嗯..是这个样子的方块
然后右击此方块，出现此界面,左边三栏意思为战士的武器,从上到下分别为 近战武器,弓箭,箭.也可以什么都不放,只不过生存的战士用空手撸而已(此界面生存的战士为友善类型的生物,将会保护玩家)
几分钟之后战士就生成了,他手上的武器取决于生成时给予的武器.

这个炮塔没看懂什么意思啊,我刷出来僵尸,这货被僵尸秒杀,也许只能打入侵者？


最后是没人看的更新日志
New in 0.4.3: Fixes ----- - fixed NoSuchMethodError crash in DimensionChunkCache, install this mod last for now if using any of my other modsNew in 0.41: Changes ------- - Updated to maintain compatibility with recent Tropicraft update - CoroAI renamed to CoroUtil Changes for MC 1.6.2 version: - Zombie speeds are changed, faster until rebalenced, be carefull fighting in open fields their movement leading is scary with the speed change - Damage might be slightly more, not 100% sure since new attribute system - Cooldowns -- Initial: 6 mc days (longer) -- Between Invasions: 10 mc days (longer) -- Between waves: 3 IRL minutes (shorter) New in v0.4 alpha: New Features ------------ - The Item Using Turret (90% complete, semi experimental) -- A new amazing way to defend your place against hostiles! -- Emulates the way players use items to make the customizing options nearly endless when you think about the mod items you could use (some have issues though) -- GUI: Has melee, ranged, and ranged ammo, and 3 fuel slots -- GUI: can change turrets 'right click' charge time for item (eg: to full charge shoot a bow) -- GUI: can change the cooldown between shots, but costs more power per shot for faster rate -- GUI: change the target range, 0-80 blocks -- GUI: toggle usage mode on melee slot to use left click or right click (so it could use a close ranged right click using item for melee) -- Requires coal or IC2 EU power source to charge internal power -- Works with a lot of mod items, specifically ones that fire projectiles, however some have issues, like thaumcraft firebat/lightning rods due to the way they raytrace for targets I think, hard to tell. Balkons boomerangs are horribly bad (duplication issue), random issues like that. -- Decently balenced for gameplay, minus the random issues with mod items -- Has recipe: bottom row is 3 mossy cobble, middle row is redstone blocks on side and mossy cobble in middle, top row is a bow in the middle -- Due to the experimental nature and difficulty of faking a player to use items as they do, it might be impossible for me to prevent this mod from allowing crashes to happen when users try out mod items with issues. A blacklist to prevent certain items from being used will be added in the future. -- Injects AI into vanilla entities so they target the turrets -- Is a combo tile entity / entity structure, if hostile kills the top piece, it will auto repair in about 15 seconds, no maintinance required (yet?) -- Preserves the state of the item after firing at a cost of power (this prevents the need to repair item etc, doesnt restore nbt state yet[?] but will in future) --- A cost to use melee/range and to undo damage --- A cost to refuel the used item from the ammo slot -- Small bugs: in some states if you switch the ranged weapon, it wont notice the change and continue to use old item, just break turret and replace :( -- combine with Zombie Awareness extra spawning and have fun setting up sandboxy tower defense scenarios! See if they can overrun it or exaust your power supply, game over man - Unit Factory (very WIP, probably OP but has no recipe yet) -- looks like a teleporter pad but actually replicates a hostile world comrade to fight with you -- Block is based off item using turret, so you can place items to give to the spawned entity -- Awesome replicating effect (  ) -- Comrade is essentially a walking item turret with none of the recharge stuff, so he'll eventually becomes less usefull --- Costs 500000 power to replicate one --- Has all the survival logic my AI has developed over the years, attacks whats closest to you, flees if low health, slowly heals and has health visual --- Teleports to you when far - RTS Building (super amazingly experimental no recipe, but 99% stable) -- A techdemo of my WIP town AI work to further my skill in AI development and desire to make a fully fledged RTS AI --- Upon placement, builds the main command building from schematic (if available) and initiates a new town instance --- Town Economy AI kicks in and produces workers ---- workers for now scan around for wood/tallgrass to gather and bring back to main base, uses base intelligent area scanning to help find resources --- Economy AI starts giving out house build orders to workers and starts trying to fill out the area with houses as the resources come in - Comrades and Workers require ZombieCraft textures to be installed for their appearance looks like, woo experimental stuff Tweaks ------ - For the most part, invaders are the same, but there has been a lot of improvements and tweaks, their stacking has been improved greatly - A config option that auto teleports the invaders to as close as 150 blocks from you was added to fix some issues when using MCPC+ with distant chunkloaded entities, however I believe the issue with MCPC+ has been since fixed, so don't use unless you have issues of invasions never showing up or getting stuck far away Also noting here because they have no proper page: CoroAI (all my AI uses) ====== - More and more and more efficiencies in the threaded pathfinding, prevented a lot of redundant path requests being added to queue - Universal tamability (see new tropicraft taming staff) - Easy config diplomacy system - Formation and Mob mentality system - Behavior Tree AI tech - New Config: cache overworld chunks only for pathfinder thread, someone had an issue of game eating all memory when my stuff is trying to cache Biomes o Plentys custom dimension, enabling this option fixed the issue (but will break my pathfinding outside of overworld) BuildMod (support mod for HW, ZC, TC) ======== - New ability to rotate schematics as they are printing into world with extremely limited metadata rotate support - new Integer using mode that fixes old bug with block ids above 256 - Planning for schematics to stop using block ids by auto generating a block name&class to id lookup map -- This will allow for ZombieCraft and other mods to support their block ids to be changed without breaking everything --- Which also means a huge plus for supporting other mods that need those block id ranges and even use with ID resolver etc ModConfig (all my mods use) ========= - New way to run custom code after a generic config update call
最后再唠叨一句，这mod的作者和那个僵尸意识，丧尸围城是一个作者,所以AI的智商挺高的,不要小看了那群僵尸哦
{:10_514:}这是楼主的第一次搬运,感觉还是很艰辛的,如果有什么不对的地方,请务必提出来,谢谢!

replies.author: cao635012782
replies.txt_content: 我和上面那个Nofeiyan一伙的，我是服主，放到服务器上试验之后发现僵尸AI是很高，但还是有很大的漏洞，例如矿工僵尸有时行动路线会出问题，会突然停下或突然往反方向挖而且不会避开岩浆和悬崖，战斗僵尸在叠人梯时会叠成Y字形，而且没有任何方法推理出老巢的具体方向，不过也算很不错了。{:10_512:}
